channel.title: Unnamed
channel.description:
Quick note: This is not my server from the projects section.
I started a little 317 project (with the intent to release), which is close to, if not entirely customized through scripts written in Java.
As is, it's very basic and missing alot of packets, with very little content. This is not a "download and run" server.
I don't have IsaacRandomGen setup, so you'll have to disable that in the client to login.
This is my first time using netty, and also first time setting up a server the way it is (as in content being setup via scripts), so if something has bugs or is done badly, let me know so I can fix it/improve it.
[u][b]Most Recent[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/v/WAXS91DU -> Fixed an issue with region changing.
[u][b]Old Downloads[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/v/d1k9ia61 -> Fixed login procedure for 317, added ground item system. http://uppit.com/v/F2VMQ1DJ -> Original
I'm a Mac whore btw, so you'll have to convert the command files to batch (shouldn't be hard).

item.title: Unnamed
item.dc:creator: @Espeon Espeon
item.description:
@Espeon wrote:

Haha, this is great Pali. Amazing job, downloading now

EDIT:
ok i got here with the run.bat code, its like really late here and i’m tired so I cant think as well as normally…

@echo off
title Server
java -cp .;./files/lib/netty.jar:files/lib/xxp.jar:files/lib/xstream.jar:bin net.palidino.server.Main

Read full topic
